body_html:
For me, the error went I away when I went into the anaconda prompt and activated tensorflow using the pre-installation command: activate tensorflow
But I still have no idea why that worked :/

body:
For me, the error went I away when I went into the anaconda prompt and activated tensorflow using the pre-installation command: `activate tensorflow`
But I still have no idea why that worked :/
